price: Hindi kayo ginagantihan maliban ng ayon sa dati ninyong ginagawa,
arabic: وَمَا تُجۡزَوۡنَ إِلَّا مَا كُنتُمۡ تَعۡمَلُونَ

version.title: Filipino (Tagalog) Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Tagalog by Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: wamā tuj'zawna illā mā kuntum taʿmalūna
